body_content.explanation: to remove odours (= smells, especially unpleasant ones) from something:
examples: Bicarbonate of soda (or baking soda) has many uses, from cleaning tiles to deodorising fridges.
Deodorize your dishwasher by sprinkling 1/2 cup soda on the bottom between loads.
The automatic toilet cleaner not only cleans and deodorizes, it kills germs.

body_content.explanation: to put on deodorant (= a substance put on the body to prevent or hide unpleasant smells):
examples: I need to shower, deodorize, and change into fresh clothes.
